text: @SpeakerPelosi Your azz didn’t give a 💩 about Covid19!  U were 2 busy impeaching POTUS, complaining he close the borders, permitted travel from China, Europe & other hotspots in the. 🌎 Your bullshit is going 2 end the dem party so plz don’t stop your bullshiff! @realDonaldTrump till 1-2025🇺🇸
